entry.tran: 使具有个性;使具有自己的特色
entry.def: To individualize a thing or person means to make them different from other things or people and to give them a recognizable identity.

example.ex: You can individualize a document by adding comments in the margins.
example.tran: 你可以在页边空白处添加评论使文件变得富有个性。
